name: Dark Phoenix
text: Steady. Toughness. Villainous. [star] When Dark Phoenix schemes, place that threat on Consume the World, if able. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck, discard pile, and set-aside area for Consume the World and reveal it.

name: Consume the World
text: Permanent. While there is no threat here, this scheme loses the [amplify] icon. Forced Response: After threat is placed here, if there is at least 12 threat here, the players lose the game.
